shortDescription: Deletes the last printed character via the 3rd and 4th variants of `print()`, and it updates the cursor position.

arguments.description: The background color to fill the character with (**-1**,**15**), **-1** means no background, defaults to the current print cursor background color.
arguments.name: c

usages.name: Delete the last character without doing a carriage return if needed:

arguments.description: The background color to fill the character with (**-1**,**15**), **-1** means no background, defaults to the current print cursor background color.
arguments.name: c
